main event: A bright white flash, the size of the moon, was observed moving rapidly and then slowing down and moving away slowly. Three commercial airliners were in the area.
interesting points: The flash was reported by a civilian pilot.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes.
The object's movement and behavior were described as characteristic of a meteor-type flame.
Efforts were made to obtain more information from the air traffic control and nearby weather stations.
The report mentions the possibility of a bursting weather balloon as the cause of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright white flash, the size of the moon
